title: Resync baseline before replaying work branch history
description: Create a fresh branch from the canonical baseline (main) so the large refactor from the work branch can be replayed without false conflict markers.
acceptance_criteria: New branch cut from the latest canonical main commit.
Branch name recorded in the task resolution log and pushed upstream.
No local modifications staged when the branch is created.

branch_plan.notes: Run the checkout steps once the canonical repository is available.
